Text: RE fundsPST I thought about that email during the game Saturday But of course going into the weekend I had lost ALL optimism because I had seen us play barelyaboveaverage football and I had seen UF light up everybody But how about that crowd And we were without several defensive starters including number in the nd half Truly astounding I was sorry Joe wouldnt let us go over to where some of the birds were stationed but I take it he sometimes has the sense that certain times are just not good for the birds And hes always going to do whats best for the health of the birds In any event can you believe Tiger flew out over the Florida section before the game Someone next to me said I hope thats an omen Turned out it was Thanks again for your role in the scholarship Phillip Vet school awards night is Monday Feb Well be in touch later with details but in essence its a pm program at the school usually lasts hours and we have a reception afterwards Hope your flight back included some Gator alumni sam
RE visit to AUPST Phillip I have a new cell phone number Thats one more option when you find me next week See you then sam

Re fundsPST Phillip greetings from Auburn where in days the eagle will fly the stadium will rock and the tigers will welcome ball state to our newly named jungle WE have this week received the matching money from Enron Also can you email me your work number again I think the dean of the vet school wants to call and say thanks for setting up the scholarship I still have you on my calendar for a tour of the raptor center on Friday Oct the day before we am I getting giddy here shock the number one ranked gators sam
